#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{	
		int t;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
            int a;
            cin>>a;
            int count=0;
            if(a%2!=0)
            {
                cout<<a-1<<endl;
            }
            else
            {
                cout<<a<<endl;
            }
            
        }
            
	return 0;
}
